caption:
A Drunk Break is an ingredient-elimination routine that gives skin a break from 6 ingredient categories that are potentially confusing or disruptive to skin. 

These ingredients aren’t dangerous, but they can hold skin back from being its best—and that means they don’t belong in skincare.

🚫 Essential oils
🚫 Solvent alcohols
🚫 Silicones
🚫 Chemical sunscreens
🚫 Fragrances/dyes
🚫 Sulfate surfactants
 
Taking these ingredients out of your routine for 30 days allows skin to reset and return to a healthy, balanced state. 
 
Ready to get Drunk? Shop our kits and bundles to get started.
